file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-03-02 - NOSE LANDING GEAR AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE LANDING GEAR AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the auxiliary brace strut of the nose landing gear (NLG). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NLG AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - RESTO- ALL 32-20-03-900-801-A ♦ RATION NLG LOWER AUXILIARY DRAG STRUT ALL 32-20-03-900-802-A ASSY - RESTORATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-03-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-20 to restore the NLG auxiliary brace strut. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-03-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-03-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG auxiliary brace strut ( AMM TASK 32-20-03-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore NLG Auxiliary Brace Strut (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-20 to restore the NLG auxiliary brace strut. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the NLG main brace strut ( AMM TASK 32-20-03-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL NLG Auxiliary Brace Strut - Restoration Figure 201 A ZONE 711 AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT DET. A 145AMM320057.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-03-900-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NLG LOWER AUXILIARY DRAG STRUT ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-20 to restore the NLG Lower Auxiliary Drag Strut Assy. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-03-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE NOSE LANDING AMM TASK 32-20-03-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-005-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG auxiliary drag strut ( AMM TASK 32-20-03-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-802-A/200 32-20-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore NLG Lower Auxiliary Drag Strut Assy SUBTASK 900-005-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-20 to restore the NLG Lower Auxiliary Drag Strut Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-005-A (1) Install the NLG auxiliary drag strut ( AMM TASK 32-20-03-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200).
